video.title: The Mortified Sessions
video.synopsis: In this engaging reality series, celebrities share some of their most embarrassing childhood mementos, from mortifying photographs to old diaries.

episodes.synopsis: Ed Helms unearths some nerdy rock lyrics he wrote in high school; Oscar winner Mo'Nique reflects on her most important childhood lessons.
episodes.title: The Office's Ed Helms & Oscar Winner Mo'Nique

episodes.synopsis: Eric Stonestreet reminisces about his unusual childhood in Kansas, his love of clowns, and his surprising roster of after-school activities.
episodes.title: Modern Family's Eric Stonestreet

episodes.synopsis: Will Forte reveals how he learned about the birds and the bees; Jennifer Grey talks about how her real life mirrored her role in Dirty Dancing.
episodes.title: SNL's Will Forte & Dirty Dancing's Jennifer Grey

episodes.synopsis: Nick Offerman recalls his formative years as a farmboy rapper; Megan Mullally reads the melodramatic poems she wrote as a teen.
episodes.title: Parks and Rec's Nick Offerman & Will & Grace's Megan Mullally

episodes.synopsis: Lea Thompson opens her angst-ridden adolescent diaries; Anthony Michael Hall reveals whether he was as geeky as the teen characters he played.
episodes.title: Back to the Future's Lea Thompson & The Breakfast Club's Anthony Michael Hall

episodes.synopsis: Actress Cheryl Hines reveals her clumsy high school dating strategies; comedian Margaret Cho shares the difficulties of growing up an outcast.
episodes.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm's Cheryl Hines and Comedienne Margaret Cho

episodes.synopsis: In an emotional interview, actor Ricky Schroder reflects on his status as a former child star and gets honest about growing up in the public eye.
episodes.title: NYPD Blue's Ricky Schroder

episodes.synopsis: Actor-filmmaker Ed Burns talks about sports -- and his sensitive side; director Paul Feig reflects on life as an adolescent outcast.
episodes.title: Filmmaker Ed Burns & Bridesmaids' Director Paul Feig

episodes.synopsis: Singer Alanis Morissette reads a poem from her past; TOMS Shoes founder Blake Mycoskie shares the strategies of his first childhood business.
episodes.title: Singer Alanis Morissette & TOMS Shoes Founder Blake Mycoskie

episodes.synopsis: Bryan Cranston shares his teenage dream of working in law enforcement; Danny Pudi talks about the Polish side of his family tree.
episodes.title: Breaking Bad's Bryan Cranston & Community's Danny Pudi
